testcase.name: XFlix should not have "View Count" option selected in sort by dropdown on page load

testcase.name: XFlix should have "View Count" option selectable after clicking on the sort by dropdown

testcase.name: XFlix should have "Upload" button on landing page on load
testcase.classname: should have "Upload" button on landing page on load

testcase.name: XFlix should open video modal with "Submit" and "Cancel" buttons, on clicking "Upload" button
testcase.classname: should open video modal with "Submit" and "Cancel" buttons, on clicking "Upload" button

testcase.name: XFlix should open video modal on clicking "Upload" button and close it on clicking "Cancel" button in the modal

testcase.name: XFlix should have at least 10 links (with class "video-tile-link") to different videos on page load.

testcase.name: XFlix should display the video page on clicking the first video tile (with class "video-tile") which has a parent element with class "video-tile-link"
